titleStmt.title: An elegy upon the decease of the most incomparable pious Lady, the Princesse Elizabeth, VVho dyed in Carisbrook Castle in the Isle of Wight, Septemb. 8. 1650.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copies (E.644[6]): "Nou: 1st"; The "0" in the imprint date is crossed out and "1651" written in. (E.625[2]): "feb. 21th".
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
